framework.name: HIPAA Security Rule
framework.description: Safeguards for protecting electronic protected health information (ePHI).

domains.name: Administrative
domains.description: Policies and procedures for managing security risk.

controls.title: Risk analysis
controls.summary_description: Identify risks to ePHI and document mitigation priorities.
controls.implementation_guidance: Maintain a risk assessment register and update after major changes.

suggested_task_templates.title: Update HIPAA risk analysis
suggested_task_templates.description: Review and update the ePHI risk assessment.

controls.title: Security management process
controls.summary_description: Implement security policies, sanctions, and risk management activities.
controls.implementation_guidance: Maintain security policies and document enforcement procedures.

controls.title: Workforce training
controls.summary_description: Train workforce members on HIPAA security obligations.
controls.implementation_guidance: Provide onboarding and annual training with completion tracking.

suggested_task_templates.title: Run HIPAA training refresh
suggested_task_templates.description: Assign and track annual HIPAA training.

controls.title: Incident procedures
controls.summary_description: Define how to identify and respond to security incidents.
controls.implementation_guidance: Maintain response procedures and escalation paths.

suggested_task_templates.title: Test HIPAA incident response
suggested_task_templates.description: Run a tabletop exercise focused on ePHI breaches.

controls.title: Facility access controls
controls.summary_description: Restrict physical access to systems handling ePHI.
controls.implementation_guidance: Use badges, visitor logs, and access review procedures.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review facility access
suggested_task_templates.description: Validate access permissions for secure areas.

controls.title: Workstation security
controls.summary_description: Protect workstations and devices that access ePHI.
controls.implementation_guidance: Apply screen lock, device protection, and secure disposal.

suggested_task_templates.title: Audit workstation security
suggested_task_templates.description: Validate device safeguards and secure disposal.

controls.title: Access control
controls.summary_description: Ensure access to ePHI is authorized and logged.
controls.implementation_guidance: Use role-based access and unique user IDs.

controls.title: Audit controls
controls.summary_description: Implement logging to record system activity involving ePHI.
controls.implementation_guidance: Centralize logs and monitor for suspicious access.

suggested_task_templates.title: Review audit logs
suggested_task_templates.description: Validate logging coverage and alert review cadence.

controls.title: Integrity safeguards
controls.summary_description: Protect ePHI from improper alteration or destruction.
controls.implementation_guidance: Use checksums, validation controls, and change logging.

controls.title: Transmission security
controls.summary_description: Protect ePHI during transmission over networks.
controls.implementation_guidance: Use encryption in transit and secure transfer protocols.

suggested_task_templates.title: Validate transport encryption
suggested_task_templates.description: Confirm TLS and secure transport for ePHI.
